description:
Encrypts and signs data on your computer and communicates with web browser extension.

Crypto Native App New Generation (hereinafter CNA) is an application developed by TESCO SW a.s., which is intended for the handling of cryptographic operations like electronic signature and encryption and decryption in the web application environment. The web application communicates with CNA using the Crypto Web Extension (hereinafter CWE), an extension installed in the web browser.

v26.1.20508 (2026/02/24)

- In sandboxed mode on macOS, it is now possible to select from certificates stored on Software602
  eToken
- If there is no associated private key for a certificate, the option for electronic signature and
  decryption is disabled
- Fixed QPIN entry dialog display for Czech eID on macOS
- Increased stability
